Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_9_Вот черт\\..\\..\\.. В:
Oh, shit\..\..\.. The traitor Claudius, the one who attacked 
Purgatory last time.
dialogs_chapter_9_Видимо решил отыгратьс: Apparently he decided to get even with the second round.
dialogs_chapter_9_Нужно срочно предупред:
We need to warn everyone immediately. Especially Sidrin 
Ruri.
We're finally back. Why are you so happy?
dialogs_chapter_9_Командир, мы говорили:
Commander, we spoke with the incarnation of Adamant. 
And Riom said such a thing\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Он предлагал мне перей:
He offered me to join his side, but I refused. Very rudely. 
He sent me away, and he went berserk.
dialogs_chapter_9_Одолели десятикратно с:
You defeated a tenfold stronger servant. Well done. 
For now, rest and get ready.
dialogs_chapter_9_К удару по армии Восст:
To strike at the army of the Risens. The scouts found 
them, and we managed to prepare teleports on that 
route. All that remains is to gather the rest of our 
forces and we will strike to intercept.
dialogs_chapter_9_Сына! Хорошо, что ты в:
Son! It's good that you're back. Irni, Kenchiru, is 
everything okay?
dialogs_chapter_9_Ирни, чем ты так довол: Irni, what are you so happy about?
dialogs_chapter_9_Ха-ха\\..\\..\\.. Пере:
Ha-ha\..\..\.. Before the explosion of the main crystal, we 
met the main Risen - Adamant. He possessed his 
warrior and started telling us all sorts of nonsense.
dialogs_chapter_9_А после предложил мне: And then he suggested that I join him.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я с его точкой зрения: I didn't agree with his point of view and showed it.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ух, ты ж\\..\\..\\.. Б:
Wow\..\..\.. I'm afraid to imagine what he'll do to you next 
time. You really made him angry.
dialogs_chapter_9_Неважно, одолел один р:
It doesn't matter, I beat him once, I can beat him 
a hundred more times.
dialogs_chapter_9_Последний раз, как я т:
The last time I saw you, your hands were shaking, 
you could barely hold a sword, but you're already 
capable of defeating demigods, standing up to an 
entire army almost single-handedly.
dialogs_chapter_9_Так сильно и быстро вы:
You've grown so much and so quickly\..\..\.. And I 
wanted to teach you everything step by step.
dialogs_chapter_9_Отдохни и готовься, на:
Rest and get ready, we're making the final push for 
victory.
dialogs_chapter_9_Армия Восставших напра:
The Risen Army is heading towards Purgatory and 
we have prepared teleporters to intercept them.
dialogs_chapter_9_Да, хорошо, дай мне па: Okay, give me a few minutes.
dialogs_chapter_9_Как у тебя настрой пер: How are you feeling before the fight?
dialogs_chapter_9_У меня есть к тебе про: I have a favor to ask of you.
dialogs_chapter_9_Р-риом! Ты так не пуга: R-Riom! Don't scare me like that?
dialogs_chapter_9_Н-незнаю, у меня что-т:
I-I don't know, something strange is going on in my 
s-soul, I-I don't understand how we got to this point\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_С-сначала мы должны бы:
First we had to make a small foray beyond the walls\..\..\.. 
to explore the jagged canyon\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_П-потом та история с к: A-then that story with the punishers\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Падение, где я чуть не: The fall, where I almost died\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Меня разрывают эмоции\:
I'm torn apart by emotions\..\..\.. and I don't k-know what 
to do with it\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом осторожно останов:
Riom carefully stopped Rita, grabbing her by the 
shoulders.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом нежно поцеловал Р: Riom kissed Rita tenderly, she didn't resist.
dialogs_chapter_9_Девушка по началу была:
The girl was initially alarmed by the lack of 
understanding, but soon relaxed.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом мог вечно наслажд: Riom could enjoy this moment forever.
dialogs_chapter_9_В этот миг Рита чувств:
At that moment, Rita felt more alive than anyone 
else.
I was thinking about you, too.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты мне не без различна:
You are not without differences to me. Even though 
you are constantly getting into trouble, I am ready to 
come to your aid at any moment.
dialogs_chapter_9_Вот оно что. Теперь я:
That's it. Now I understand. Lately, whenever you
came near me, my heart beat faster.
dialogs_chapter_9_Пообещай, что когда вс:
Promise me that when this is all over, you'll take me 
on a date where there won't be any reapers, 
devastators\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_В тихое место, где мож: To a quiet place where you can relax.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом легонько поцелова: Riom kissed Rita lightly on the lips.
dialogs_chapter_9_Прошу тебя, когда на п:
I beg you, when the battlefield starts to get hot, 
hide, run, stay away from your enemies.
dialogs_chapter_9_Их там будет больше об:
There will be more of them there than usual. I don't 
want to lose you.
dialogs_chapter_9_Тебе такое по силам? Н:
Can you handle that? To deviate a little from our 
mistress's orders.
dialogs_chapter_9_Могу обещать держаться:
I can promise to stay in the back rows. That won't 
be a problem.
dialogs_chapter_9_Привет. Готовы к после:
Hello. Are you ready for the final battle with the 
Risen?
dialogs_chapter_9_Да, путем. Немного стр:
Yeah, right. It's a bit scary. Usually I take part in 
small skirmishes, but this\..\..\.. it's going to be a real 
meat grinder.
dialogs_chapter_9_Нас больше, но Восстав:
There are more of us, but the Risen are stronger 
than us. One adamant can will take 3-10 combat 
reapers, and there are about 500 of them, or even 
more.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ривальсеры мало что сд: The Revelers won't do much, at most they can delay.
dialogs_chapter_9_Если все поляжем, то Ч: If we all die, then Purgatory is finished.
dialogs_chapter_9_Спокойно, Ирни. От наг: Calm down, Irni. It won't get better from escalating.
dialogs_chapter_9_Они сильны, но мы не п:
They are strong, but we will not simply intercept them in 
the canyon. Here, they, like us, will be divided into groups, 
and the better each reaper shows himself individually, 
the higher the chance of cleanly defeating them.
dialogs_chapter_9_Сейчас бы обладать маг:
Now, if only I had a magical artifact, and not this
toothpick.
dialogs_chapter_9_Надо было об этом дума:
We should have thought of this when we were in Purgatory\..\..\..
a couple of years ago.
dialogs_chapter_9_Даже с таким оружием у: Even with such weapons, we have a decent chance.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ладно, рожи кислые, ра: Okay, sour faces, since the occasion is serious\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Роза достала по 5 буты: Rosa took out 5 bottles of alcohol.
dialogs_chapter_9_По одной на каждого, к:
One for each, less concentrate, so there should be no 
swaying from side to side.
dialogs_chapter_9_За то чтобы мы все вер: So that we all come back.
dialogs_chapter_9_Все легонько “чокнулис:
Everyone gently clinked their bottles, trying not to attract 
attention.
dialogs_chapter_9_Что ж, спасибо и удачи: Well, thanks and good luck to all of us.
dialogs_chapter_9_О, Риом! Как настрой?:
Oh, Riom! How are you feeling? Ready to finish off the rest of 
the Risen?
dialogs_chapter_9_Да, только, скажи. Поч:
Yes, just tell me. Why, no matter how hard I try to convince 
someone to put down their weapons, no one listens to me?
You see\..\..\.. When you are created by higher powers for 
some purpose, it is not beneficial for them to give you free will.
dialogs_chapter_9_Представь, какой хаос:
Imagine the chaos that would occur if everyone in our world 
were allowed to do whatever they want.
dialogs_chapter_9_Тут нигде не будет без: There will be no safe or peaceful corner anywhere here.
dialogs_chapter_9_Мы разнесем свой собст:
We will destroy our own world and the human world at the 
same time.
dialogs_chapter_9_Поэтому все, с кем ты:
That is why everyone you have spoken to strictly follows 
the rules and laws of their creator, no matter how crazy he is.
dialogs_chapter_9_Тогда как тебе удалось: Then how did you manage to convince Vlur-Stig?
dialogs_chapter_9_Влияние. Я Вероломгер,:
Influence. I am a Verolomger, a being of a higher 
order, he is a Hierarch, a demigod, also of a higher 
order. Our voices are equal to each other, so he 
could at least listen to what I say.
dialogs_chapter_9_А ты в глазах большинс:
And in the eyes of most, you are just a small reaper.
Therefore, until you reach the form of release, it is 
unlikely that higher beings will take you seriously.
dialogs_chapter_9_Но не заблуждайся насч:
But make no mistake about the high reapers, we are as
killable as everyone else. Traitor is just a title for
Purgatory. Outside of it, we are just reapers. And it all 
depends on the circumstances and your behavior.
dialogs_chapter_9_Сила нужна, но она не:
Strength is necessary, but it is not the main thing. 
It is also important what and to whom you say, how you 
react, how you think, act. It is not difficult to become a traitor, 
but it is much more difficult to fulfill your duties with dignity.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты бы смогла убедить В:
Could you convince the Risen to retreat? If you spoke to 
Adamant\..\..\.. through his incarnation.
dialogs_chapter_9_Не-не, рада, что ты оц:
No, no, I'm glad you appreciate my level of diplomacy, 
but no. It's impossible to convince someone who stands 
firm in their position and does not compromise.
dialogs_chapter_9_Пойми Риом, наш мир бе:
Understand Riom, our world is crazy and it is impossible to 
convince someone who has the power to create and destroy 
everything around them.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ненависть Адаманта к н:
Adamant's hatred for us stretches back centuries, he 
yearns to destroy us at any cost, even if he loses.
dialogs_chapter_9_Знаешь\\..\\..\\.. Тво:
You know\..\..\.. Your tendency to act rationally, to speak first 
and then to hit\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Из тебя получился бы н: You would make a good Verolomger.
dialogs_chapter_9_С-спасибо, а это возмо: T-thank you, is this possible in the near future?
dialogs_chapter_9_Как только разнесем Во:
As soon as we destroy the Risen\..\..\.. Afterwards, I will 
help you achieve the form of release, and pass 
a series of tests. A lot depends on you here\..\..\.. 
almost everything.
dialogs_chapter_9_Для начала, ты станешь:
To begin with, you will become my personal assistant 
and bodyguard, the right hand of the entire corps of 
combat reapers.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты не подумай, законы:
Don't get me wrong, the laws and rules will still apply 
to you, like everyone else. But the duties and 
assignments will be much more serious.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом слегка удивился т: Riom was slightly surprised by such a sudden step.
dialogs_chapter_9_Но потом отдался течен: But then he gave in to the flow, like last time.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ничто не вечно и пора: Nothing lasts forever and it's time to float back to reality.
dialogs_chapter_9_Выполни всё, что от те:
Do everything that is required of you and please\..\..\.. survive.
Do you promise?
dialogs_chapter_9_Ха-ха\\..\\..\\.. Ох,: Ha-ha\..\..\..Oh, Riom. Good, I believe in you.
dialogs_chapter_9_Не буду больше задержи: I won't keep you any longer.
dialogs_chapter_9_Леди Лаурита, как ты?:
Lady Laurita, how are you? Are you ready for the 
coming battle?
dialogs_chapter_9_Да, как и всегда. Нева:
Yes, as always. No matter how strong the enemy 
before me, he will quickly turn to dust.
dialogs_chapter_9_Слушай, мне сейчас не: Listen, I don't feel like talking right now.
dialogs_chapter_9_Если не знаешь, о чем:
If you don't know what to talk about, then don't waste your 
time.
dialogs_chapter_9_Вижу ты не в настроени: I see you're not in the mood. As you say, madam.
dialogs_chapter_9_\\..\\..\\..И будь ост:
\..\..\..And be careful, keep the sword away from the 
adamantine charges, otherwise it will fly apart.
dialogs_chapter_9_Здравствуй, Риом. Тебе: Hello, Riom. Do you need new gear too?
dialogs_chapter_9_Нет, своей хватает. Ка:
No, we have enough of our own. How are you here? 
Are you ready for what awaits us.
dialogs_chapter_9_Лично, я да. Если убью:
Personally, yes. If they kill me, I don't regret anything. 
I lived like a reaper, I died like a reaper. I did my duty 
and that's fine, I hope Death will be pleased.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я бы очень хотел выжит:
I would really like to survive, but it will be as it turns out. 
There are many Risens and they are superior to us in 
strength, and we are only slightly superior.
dialogs_chapter_9_Но с нами 2 Вероломгер:
But we have 2 Verolomgers with us, almost everyone 
who has an artifact weapon is with us, so we are still 
equal in strength.
dialogs_chapter_9_Дерек достал из карман: Derek took a gold coin out of his pocket.
dialogs_chapter_9_У людей я подсмотрел о: I saw a funny game people play.
dialogs_chapter_9_“Веришь-неверишь” врод: “Believe it or not,” I think it’s called.
dialogs_chapter_9_Суть, говоришь - “вери:
The point is, you say, “you believe it’s heads or tails,” 
the others also make a bet and the one with the coin 
makes a toss. The one who guesses correctly wins.
dialogs_chapter_9_Сделаем то же самое, н:
Let's do the same, but with a nuance - I won't show the coin 
after the toss, and you'll find out the result at the end of the 
fight\..\..\.. who lost the bet.
dialogs_chapter_9_Веришь - орел, не вери: Believe it - heads, don't believe it - tails.
dialogs_chapter_9_Дерек показал жнецам о: Derek showed the reapers both sides of the coin.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом, веришь, или не в:
Riom, do you or don't you believe that we will defeat the 
Risen?
dialogs_chapter_9_Дерек быстро подбросил:
Derek quickly flipped the coin. Caught it, looked at it,
scribbled magic on it, and immediately put it in his pocket.
dialogs_chapter_9_И теперь мы узнаем ито: And now we will know the outcome at the end of the battle?
dialogs_chapter_9_Моя лавка открыта, так: My shop is open, so take what you need and go.
Irni, Rosa\..\..\.. guys. Should I help, or should I trust that 
they can handle it themselves?
Thank you very much\..\..\..You helped us a lot, I saved 
some ingots for the wounded, you can take the rest 
for yourself.
dialogs_chapter_9_Тебе нравится то, что: Do you like what you're doing?!
dialogs_chapter_9_Губишь своих подчиненн:
Killing your subordinates, blindly rushing towards 
Purgatory, knowing that you will all be killed. 
Is this what you want?
dialogs_chapter_9_Мой владыка должен был:
My lord should have told you the whole essence of our
rebellion.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я не хочу убивать боль:
I don't want to kill more than necessary, so\..\..\.. get out 
of the way, please. I am only an executor of the will 
and it is not for me to decide our future.
dialogs_chapter_9_Мы заберем, то что при: We will take what is rightfully ours and leave.
dialogs_chapter_9_Нет уж\\..\\..\\.. Я и:
No way\..\..\.. I sincerely hoped that at least someone in this 
world was endowed with common sense. I hoped that at 
least one of you, the Risens, would agree to solve all 
problems peacefully.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом. Мы лишь пешки ис:
Riom. We are only pawns carrying out the will of higher 
powers. We have no choice.
dialogs_chapter_9_Знаю, и я выбрал. Раз:
I know, and I have chosen. If you want blood so much, 
you will get it in full and die along with your puppets!
dialogs_chapter_9_Кригер перехватил лезв:
Krieger intercepted the blade of Genome Morkret with 
his right hand.
dialogs_chapter_9_Хватит! Таким тупым ле: Enough! You can't reach me with such a dull blade.
dialogs_chapter_9_Много жнецов в строю?: How many reapers are in the line?
dialogs_chapter_9_Он твой. Я велю осталь: He's yours. I'll tell the others to move to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты же\\..\\..\\.. Друг: Aren't you\..\..\.. My father's friend\..\..\.. Claudius?
dialogs_chapter_9_Клавдий уже был готов:
Claudius was about to attack Riom, but he 
stopped as if someone had called out to him. 
Riom was also called on the radio.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риома тоже позвали по: Riom was also called on the radio.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом Рури, возвращайте:
Riom Ruri, come back quickly! We need your
help.
dialogs_chapter_9_У Розы отрублена левая:
Rosa's left arm is cut off, she is covered from 
head to toe with cuts. Irni lies with a slit throat, 
but his eyes are open and his lungs are moving.
dialogs_chapter_9_Рутгер с Хифлоком выгл:
Rutger and Hiflock look no better and show no 
signs of life.
dialogs_chapter_9_Роза\\..\\..\\.. Могу: Rose\..\..\.. Is there anything I can do to help?
dialogs_chapter_9_Тогда\\..\\..\\.. выре:
Then\..\..\.. cut out the pieces of crystals from your 
back\..\..\.. I was slightly irradiated, but my aura is 
strong\..\..\.. Don't be afraid, I won't become one of 
them.
dialogs_chapter_9_Из раны полился огромн:
A huge stream of blood and viscous liquid poured 
out of the wound.
The last one\..\..\.. It's right in your neck. If I rip it out\..\..\.. 
you'll die.
dialogs_chapter_9_Роза аккуратно взялась: Rose carefully took hold of the Genome blade.
dialogs_chapter_9_Знаешь, Ирни всегда ка:
You know, I always thought Irni was some kind of 
idiot. He was hitting on me somehow ineptly and 
senselessly. I was constantly teasing him and 
ruining his expectations.
And then he saved me\..\..\.. One of the adamantine 
freaks almost took my head off.
But in return\..\..\.. You see for yourself. I've never 
seen someone fight so long and calmly with a slit 
throat. As if it were a mosquito bite.
dialogs_chapter_9_Хе-хе. У меня не остал: Heh-heh. I have no ingots left. So save him.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я соврала. Кристаллы а:
I lied. Adamantine crystals grow in the brain and
then - throughout the body. I'm finished, no matter 
how you twist and turn.
dialogs_chapter_9_В моей комнате есть ре:
In my room there is a recipe for the swill that I 
treated you to.
dialogs_chapter_9_Если встретишь жнеца п:
If you meet a reaper like me, teach her this
craft, let it live on in at least one copy.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом достал слиток жиз: Riom took out a life ingot and used it on Irni.
dialogs_chapter_9_Нух-х череп-п ц-целый: Nuh-h the skull is whole and normal.
dialogs_chapter_9_У Ирни практически нет:
Irina has almost no teeth. The inside of her mouth is 
crushed.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ирни, пока не разговар:
Irni, don't talk yet. A couple of minutes and your jaw 
will be as good as new.
dialogs_chapter_9_Под ребра мы немного п:
We got a little hit in the ribs, but yeah, everything's 
fine.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ещё раз спасибо, ты сп:
Thanks again, you saved us and we're in your debt, 
Riom.
dialogs_chapter_9_Пустяки. Отпразднуем,:
No big deal. We'll celebrate when we finish off the rest 
of the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ранения у Риты не серь: Rita's wounds aren't serious. A few shallow cuts.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом! Ты как? Не ранен: Riom! How are you? Are you injured? I can heal you!
dialogs_chapter_9_Всё нормально. Руку мн:
Everything's fine. They've already restored my arm, 
and the rest is trifles.
dialogs_chapter_9_Хорошо\\..\\..\\.. Есл: Okay\..\..\.. If anything happens, contact me.
dialogs_chapter_9_У Лауриты изрублено ли:
Laurita's face is cut up. She's missing her right arm 
and left leg.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом достал лечебный с: Riom took out a healing ingot and used it on Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_9_Вот же не повезло\\..\:
What bad luck\..\..\.. I froze many of them with my release 
form, but\..\..\.. it turned out that the adamant charge can 
deactivate it\..\..\.. I should warn the others too.
dialogs_chapter_9_С Восставшими лучше би: It's better to fight the Risen without releasing.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты не против, если я п: Do you mind if I help with\..\..\.. limbs?
dialogs_chapter_9_А с чего быть против?:
Why would I mind? Those who have fallen won't need 
them, and we need to finish off the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом восстановил недос: Riom restored Laurita's missing body parts.
dialogs_chapter_9_Как прошла встречи с г: How did the meeting with the leader go?
Not without injuries\..\..\.. But I survived, and thank you for 
that.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кригер. Так вроде зову:
Krieger. That's what they call him, if you believe the 
reports.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я смог его ранить, оче:
I was able to wound him, very badly, but Claudius got 
in the way.
dialogs_chapter_9_Клавдий. Давно я не сл: Claudius. I haven't heard that name in a long time.
dialogs_chapter_9_Когда он был хорошим ж:
When he was a good reaper, the kindest I've ever 
seen.
dialogs_chapter_9_Он всё время путешеств:
He traveled all the time and organized expeditions.
Thanks to him, we know so much about the minerals 
and resources around us.
dialogs_chapter_9_И он - первый, кто сто:
And he was the first to encounter Adamant, or rather, 
the uprising of this mineral.
dialogs_chapter_9_Клавдий спас твоего от:
Claudius saved your father and others from infection 
and took the full brunt of the energy wave during the 
explosion.
dialogs_chapter_9_Теперь он наш враг. И:
Now he is our enemy. And Sidrin is ready to give 
everything to put his best friend's soul to rest\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Если это сделаю я, оте: If I do this, will my father be offended?
dialogs_chapter_9_Не знаю. Скажу одно, н:
I don't know. I'll say one thing, don't underestimate Claudius 
or Krieger.
dialogs_chapter_9_Они все одинаково опас: They are all equally dangerous and strong.
dialogs_chapter_9_Хорошо, учту на будуще: Okay, I'll keep that in mind for the future.
dialogs_chapter_9_Лаурита потеряла левую:
Laurita lost her left arm, her body is covered in light
wounds.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом\\..\\..\\.. Тяжел:
Riom\..\..\.. It's been a tough day\..\..\.. Did you deal with the 
leader of the Risens?
dialogs_chapter_9_Почти\\..\\..\\.. Он м: Almost\..\..\.. He beat me up, but he got it too.
I think I'll pass for now\..\..\.. I need to rest, this form of
release is taking all my strength\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Рикард потерял правую:
Ricard lost his right arm up to the shoulder. His body 
is pretty mutilated.
Damn it\..\..\.. I hoped that no one would catch me in this 
state\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_А чего стесняться? Тут:
What's there to be embarrassed about? Everyone here 
is injured.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ладно, другие, но я, с:
Okay, the others, but I, the symbol of the entire punitive 
detachment, have pretty mucked up.
dialogs_chapter_9_Гордыня до добра не до: Pride leads to nothing good, commander.
dialogs_chapter_9_*Фыркает* Иди ты\\..\\:
*Snorts* Go away\..\..\.. I should have been in your place when
you met Krieger and Claudius or Folter.
dialogs_chapter_9_Пару взмахов меча и вс:
A couple of swings of the sword and that's it, the war is over. 
As a result, I wasted my power on all sorts of trifles. 
Although it is not weak.
dialogs_chapter_9_Прости, что не оправда: Sorry for not living up to expectations.
dialogs_chapter_9_Признаю, ты хорош. Доб:
I admit, you are good. You got this far, survived 
where many would have died. I do not regret giving 
the Genome to you.
dialogs_chapter_9_Но впредь, когда встре:
But in the future, when you meet those freaks, 
squeeze everything out of the sword,
even if it becomes covered in cracks.
dialogs_chapter_9_И да, если что, можешь:
And yes, if anything happens, you can take control of 
the punishers for yourself, if you want.
dialogs_chapter_9_Командовать всем корпу: Command the entire corps? Of which there is nothing left.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ага, это мой последний:
Yeah, this is my last gift to you. If you want, seize power
in Purgatory, if you want, kill everyone with or without 
reason\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_С этой минуты мне все: From now on, I don't care. I have my own things to do.
dialogs_chapter_9_Нет, Риом, тебе думать: No, Riom, it's bad for you to think. Take it and act.
dialogs_chapter_9_Верно, такой ответ мне: Right, I like that answer better. Now go, finish the job.
dialogs_chapter_9_Подробности расскажет: Your father will tell you the details.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом! Хвала нашей созд: Ryom! Praise our creator, you are alive!
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты как, в порядке? Бит: Are you okay? Can you fight?
dialogs_chapter_9_Догони небольшую групп:
Catch up with a small group of Risens together with 
Kenchiru and destroy the machine they are preparing 
to strike at Purgatory, and I need to return to 
Purgatory urgently and prepare a defense.
dialogs_chapter_9_Как только закончите,: Once you're done, head straight to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_9_И постарайтесь сильно:
And try not to waste too much energy on the 
soldiers if you meet Krieger or\..\..\.. Claudius. Run. 
Retreat to Purgatory, meet up with the others.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ваши жизни ценнее купо: Your lives are more valuable than the dome.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кенчиру, я получил при: Kenchiru, I received an order from Sidrin.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кенчиру. Отец рассказа:
Kenchiru. Father told me about the installation we 
must destroy. Are you ready to move toward it?
dialogs_chapter_9_Конечно, но пешком мы:
Sure, but we won't catch up with them on foot. 
For, I mean, the teleport is not far from the signal of 
this\..\..\.. thing.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я же просил. Остановис:
I asked you to. Stop. Don't force me to take
another reckless life.
dialogs_chapter_9_Заткнись. Я не дам раз:
Shut up. I won't let you destroy the whole meaning 
of my existence.
As you say\..\..\.. Master. Grant me all your strength
to crush this kid into dust.
dialogs_chapter_9_Как бы Риом не пытался: No matter how hard Riom tries, his wounds won't heal.
dialogs_chapter_9_Что? Портал готов? Хор: What? Is the portal ready? Okay, I'm moving out.
(No\..\..\.. Rita. Don't even think about it.)
dialogs_chapter_9_Удар Риты оказался нас:
Rita's blow was so strong that it almost cut off
Krieger's right arm.
dialogs_chapter_9_Иди ко мне, консервная:
Come to me, tin can! Are you wearing armor for 
show? It's useless!
dialogs_chapter_9_Кригер со всей силы на:
Krieger stepped on Rita's foot with all his might and 
turned her into mincemeat.
dialogs_chapter_9_Следующим ударом Криге:
With his next blow, Krieger crushed Rita's knee, 
so that the bones turned in the opposite direction. 
Rita is completely immobilized.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кригер засунул часть в:
Krieger shoved some of his entrails right into the 
girl's mouth.
dialogs_chapter_9_Последним ударом Криге:
With his last blow, Krieger extended his claws and 
spun his hand 360 degrees at a tremendous speed.
dialogs_chapter_9_Я бы выбрался\\..\\..\:
I would have gotten out\..\..\.. As usual\..\..\.. With the power 
of Koeltan, luck, circumstances.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты всегда избегала опа: You always avoided danger\..\..\.. Never looked for trouble.
dialogs_chapter_9_Каково хрена именно се: Why the hell did you let me down now!? KOELTAN!
dialogs_chapter_9_Т-ты могла вернуться в: Y-you could have gone back to Purgatory!
dialogs_chapter_9_Если он меня уложил та:
If he took me down so easily\..\..\..then you're no match for 
him\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_П-почему именно сейчас:
W-why now?! Why didn't you run away when he didn't
die from a blow to the back?!
dialogs_chapter_9_И как я теперь сдержу:
And how am I going to keep my promise now\..\..\.. to take you 
on a date, to a quiet, beautiful place that you won't find in 
our world\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Я столько хотел тебе п:
I wanted to show you so much\..\..\.. in the world of the 
Living\..\..\.. but\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Прости. П-прости, за т:
Sorry. S-sorry for being useless at the most

critical moment.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ты в безопасности\\..\:
You're safe\..\..\.. Listen, you need to come to your 
senses quickly, the Risen have already broken 
through the Purgatory's defense line.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кен, где Рита, где её: Ken, where is Rita, where is her body?
dialogs_chapter_9_Она пыталась меня спас: She tried to save me, but\..\..\.. you see how it ended.
dialogs_chapter_9_И ещё. Где был ты?: And one more thing. Where were you?
dialogs_chapter_9_От того падения я еле:
I barely survived and recovered from that fall, and 
when I came back\..\..\.. It was too late.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ха-ха-ха\\..\\..\\.. Н:
Ha-ha-ha\..\..\.. How badly did that fall hurt you?
Torn off your legs? Gutted you. If you wanted, such 
wounds can be healed in a few moments.
dialogs_chapter_9_Прости, что не успел п: Sorry I didn't have time to help. I was in a hurry!
dialogs_chapter_9_В один момент. Случило:
In an instant. It all happened. Krieger overpowered 
me in an instant, you were thrown God knows where 
and for how long, Koeltan stopped helping when it 
was needed most, and Rita\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом, пожалуйста, прид:
Riom, please come to your senses. I'm sorry it turned 
out this way. If you want, you can kill me in the arena 
when we're done\..\..\.. I'll atone for my guilt, however you 
want.
dialogs_chapter_9_Но сейчас есть проблем: But right now there's a more important problem.
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом устало махнул рук: Ryome waved his hand wearily towards Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_9_Насколько далеко они п: How far have they broken through?
dialogs_chapter_9_До ядра Чистилища ещё:
It's still a long way to the core of Purgatory. 
Just beyond the wall, the reapers are fighting them 
in the streets.
dialogs_chapter_9_Да, но только в одну с: Yes, but only in one direction - to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_9_А обменник и сборщик?: And the exchanger and the collector?
dialogs_chapter_9_Хорошо, дай мне пару м: Okay, give me a few minutes.
dialogs_chapter_9_Когда меня отбросило в:
When I was thrown back by the explosion, the 
height was too great, and it took me a long time to 
recover. When I came back, I was too late\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Нет\\..\\..\\.. Ты пра:
No\..\..\.. You did the right thing. Krieger is too strong. 
You wouldn't have done anything to him.
dialogs_chapter_9_В любом случае, нужно: In any case, we need to move towards the others.
dialogs_chapter_9_Насколько далеко Восст: How far have the Risen broken through?
dialogs_chapter_9_Риом, беги быстро, я з: Riom, run quickly, I'm following you.
dialogs_chapter_9_Прости\\..\\..\\.. Нел:
Sorry\..\..\.. We can't leave them a working teleport right 
behind us.
dialogs_chapter_9_Что такие хмурые? Хоте:
Why are you so gloomy? We wanted to quickly catch 
up with the others. Not today.
dialogs_chapter_9_Ну, господа, подходите:
Well, gentlemen, come, either in a crowd or one 
by one.
dialogs_chapter_9_Кенчиру достал бутылку: Kenchiru took out a bottle of booze from Rose.
dialogs_chapter_9_Выпил всё залпом до дн: Drank it all in one gulp.
Lady Rose\..\..\.. You make amazing cocktails with
alcohol\..\..\.. Thanks for everything, guys\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Пошли вы все нахрен! Х: Fuck you all! If you want to kill me, catch me!
dialogs_chapter_9_Гады\\..\\..\\.. Хвала: Bastards\..\..\.. Praise the lady for a strong body\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_9_Пора сваливать!: Time to get out of here!
dialogs_chapter_9_Спасибо, за то что про:
Thank you for watching another episode of Riom Ruri's 
story! Episode 9 is currently in development.
